head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GREENSTEIN, JANICE SUSAN BOOKE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GREENSTEIN, JANICE SUSAN BOOKE

block.p: GREENSTEIN--Janice Susan Booke. My dear Jani, our Lido Beach Princess. Beautiful, bright, happy, insightful, dignified and elegant. A real lady. You wore the unimpeachable crown of a good name and with style. An unrivaled LBHS and U of M Cheerleader, who throughout life continued to encourage, inspire and elevate both family and friends. Ed, Josh, Jeff were blessed. I will always love and miss you. Joey (Joel J. Kassimir, M.D.)
